page.title: 09BUILDING-PRINCES RISBOROUGH
page.content: The building industry has grown with the housing increase over the past twenty five years. Quite a high percentage of the working population are employed in building, many work into London and the adjoining counties. There are several compaines who employ over twelve operatives, but in the main it is a local industry of small operatives of two or three workers. The current yellow pages directory shows twenty one firms or individuals trading as builders. Their names are well known locally and their reputation spreads well beyond this small country market town. These local builders have been responsible for much of the modern housing in the area which ranges from Georgian style, through detached and semiu detached on open plan estates to maisonettes and single person flats.
